vote.title: Authorize an amendment to the tax increment financing (“TIF”) development and Chapter 380 Grant Agreement with Island Rock Holdings, LLC (“Developer”) previously authorized by Resolution No. 22-1463 to allow the Director of the Office of Economic Development to approve an assignment of the construction of the public infrastructure component of the Longhorn Ballroom Redevelopment Project and the remaining unexpended portion of the TIF Subsidy (net of costs incurred by Developer for the engineering design of the public infrastructure component) to the City’s Department of Public Works and/or Department of Transportation for bidding and construction - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize an amendment to the tax increment financing (“TIF”) development and Chapter 380 Grant Agreement with Island Rock Holdings, LLC (“Developer”) previously authorized by Resolution No. 22-1463 to allow the Director of the Office of Economic Development to approve an assignment of the construction of the public infrastructure component of the Longhorn Ballroom Redevelopment Project and the remaining unexpended portion of the TIF Subsidy (net of costs incurred by Developer for the engineering design of the public infrastructure component) to the City’s Department of Public Works and/or Department of Transportation for bidding and construction - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
